title: Velagapudi Ramakrishna Siddhartha Engineering College: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement

basic_info.name: VRSEC Scholarship
description: Alumni Association of V.R.Siddhartha Engineering College, Kanuru initiated a scholarship program “SIDDHARTHA SAHAAYA”. Under this program, meritorious and economically poor students are being identified and selected in the first year of their Engineering program. Each student is awarded Rs.15,000/- per year towards the living expenses and gets continued for four years of the program. Siddhartha Sahaaya scholarships started with 7 students during the academic year 2009-10 reached 130 students by the year 2018-19.

basic_info.name: Velagapudi Ramakrishna Siddhartha Engineering College Placements
description: VRSEC has a Training & Placement Department. The objective of this Department is to equip students with globally employable skills through training and to help them attain their desired employment and career goals. It helps manage a streamlined Placement process, taking care of the interests of students, recruiters, and the College. Some of the top campus recruiters are:
Read More: Velagapudi Ramakrishna Siddhartha Engineering College Placement

faqs.question: What are the documents required while applying for admission to VRSEC?
faqs.answer: The following documents are required while applying for admission in this college:Two passport size photographsMarks sheet of qualifying examination i.e. Class XII or equivalent.Date of Birth Certificate as indicated in class XReserved category/sub-category Certificate (if applicable)Medical fitness certificate (Original Copy)

faqs.question: What extracurricular activities take place at VRSEC?
faqs.answer: Following extracurricular activities take place at the college:National Cadet Corps: The College has a unit of NCC. There are 200 cadets in the unit of NCC.National Service SchemeAll India, South-zone, inter-university and also inter-collegiate sports tournaments

faqs.question: How is the faculty at Velagapudi Ramakrishna Siddhartha Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.The faculty at VRSEC consists of principal, professors, associate, and assistant professors. All the members are highly qualified in their respective fields with most of them having a Ph.D. degree. They are well-experienced teachers. They focus on students' overall development and not restrict to just academics.Read More:VRSEC Faculty

faqs.question: Can foreign national students take admission in VRSEC for B.Tech courses?
faqs.answer: No, only Indian nationals can take admission into VRSEC for the B.Tech course.

faqs.question: Ques. What is the cutoff for B.Tech at VRSEC?
faqs.answer: Ans.The cutoff list for B.Tech at VRSEC is declared each year according to the candidates’ performance in the entrance exam. Check the link below for a detailed cutoff description for VRSEC.Read More:Velagapudi Ramakrishna Siddhartha Engineering College Cut off

faqs.question: What is the reservation policy?
faqs.answer: Ans.There is relaxation for reserved categories during the selection process. Seats will be filled by the Government of Andhra Pradesh as per the Government approved Policy.The sanctioned seats in each program in the college are classified into CATEGORY – A and CATEGORY – B at first-year level and Lateral Entry at the second-year level.For Category A, 70% of seats will be filled by the Government of Andhra Pradesh as per the norms approved. For Category B, 30% of seats will be filled by the College as per the norms approved by the Government of Andhra Pradesh. Lateral entry candidates shall be admitted into the third semester directly as per the norms approved by the Government of Andhra Pradesh.

faqs.question: Ques. How many courses are offered by VRSEC?
faqs.answer: Ans.VRSEC offers a total of 19 courses across 3 streams for which admissions are on the basis of entrance exams.

faqs.question: Ques. Which entrance exam is accepted at VRSEC for admission into the B.Tech programme?
faqs.answer: Ans.For admission into the B.Tech programme of VRSEC, candidates are required to appear for JEE Main and clear the cut-off.

faqs.question: Ques. Is VRSEC accredited by NAAC?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, VRSEC is accredited by National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC).

faqs.question: Ques. Does VRSEC provides scholarships to its students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, VRSEC provides merit basis scholarships to its students. Siddhartha Sahaya scholarships are provided to top 10 merit students every year.

faqs.question: Ques. What is the fee for MBA at VRSEC?
faqs.answer: Ans.The total fee for MBA at VRSEC is INR 1.24 Lakhs.

faqs.question: Ques. Who are the top recruiters at VRSEC?
faqs.answer: Ans.Infosys, Accenture, Capgemini, Mphasis, Amazon, Syntel, Deloitte, Tech Mahindra, Polaris, Hyundai Motors are some of its top recruiters.

Section.name: About VRSEC
Section.description:
Velagapudi Ramakrishna Siddhartha Engineering College was established in 1977. It offers B.Tech in the UG course. Eligibility for this course is 10 + 2 passed from a recognized university. Admission to B.Tech is done on the basis of the AP EAMCET entrance exam. In the PG category, the college offers M.Tech, MCA, and MBA. Eligibility for these courses is a bachelor's degree in a relevant field. Selection in M.Tech and MBA, MCA is done on the basis of PGECET and AP ICET entrance exams respectively.
Read More: VRSEC Results
4.1 How to Apply?

Alumni Association of V.R.Siddhartha Engineering College, Kanuru initiated a scholarship program “SIDDHARTHA SAHAAYA”. Under this program, meritorious and economically poor students are being identified and selected in the first year of their Engineering program. Each student is awarded Rs.15,000/- per year towards the living expenses and gets continued for four years of the program. Siddhartha Sahaaya scholarships started with 7 students during the academic year 2009-10 reached 130 students by the year 2018-19.
VRSEC has a Training & Placement Department. The objective of this Department is to equip students with globally employable skills through training and to help them attain their desired employment and career goals. It helps manage a streamlined Placement process, taking care of the interests of students, recruiters, and the College. Some of the top campus recruiters are:

Ques. What is the reservation policy?
Ans. There is relaxation for reserved categories during the selection process. Seats will be filled by the Government of Andhra Pradesh as per the Government approved Policy.
The sanctioned seats in each program in the college are classified into CATEGORY – A and CATEGORY – B at first-year level and Lateral Entry at the second-year level.
For Category A, 70% of seats will be filled by the Government of Andhra Pradesh as per the norms approved. For Category B, 30% of seats will be filled by the College as per the norms approved by the Government of Andhra Pradesh. Lateral entry candidates shall be admitted into the third semester directly as per the norms approved by the Government of Andhra Pradesh.
